entry.title: Python 3.8 new stuff, assignment expressions - Eli Gur - PyCon Israel 2019
Dataclasses: The effortless tool to define data
entry.summary:
Description

Available starting Python 3.7, the dataclasses (introduced in PEP 557) are finally here. Amazingly simple solution for data with great exressiveness, the next generation of dicts, named tuples and records. The presentation will explain what the dataclasses are, show practical examples, and go over the main features and the key design decisions as well as the capabilities.

entry.title: Hypothesis: Simpler Powerful Test Cases
entry.summary:
Description

Hypothesis is an advanced testing library for Python. It lets you write tests which are parametrized by a source of examples, and then generates simple and comprehensible examples that make your tests fail. This lets you find more bugs in your code with less work.

entry.title: Type hints in Python
entry.summary:
Description

Short intro for the new feature of Python 3.5 and how it can improve your Python coding

Slides available here: http://il.pycon.org/2016/static/sessions/eli-gur-typehints.pdf

entry.title: PyTest, the testing framework you've been dreaming of
entry.summary:
Description

An introduction to PyTest enabling people a simple start with it as well getting the information about its strengths and features

Slides available here: http://il.pycon.org/2016/static/sessions/eli-gur-pytest.pdf
